nodes.title: Day 4-5: Langkawi
nodes.excerpt: Scenes from a 007 Restaurant The view from Scarborough Fish & Chips was cinematic. Classic 50s Christmas music, sprawling picture perfect…
nodes.description: Fridays in Malaysia are quiet as the Muslim majority population, especially in the more ritual Langkawi, close up their shops and restaurants for the day. Even at our Eagleye homestay, their Tamarind Cafe was shuttered so we had to explore the island for our meals.
